analyzed: by'am dmar po las nor bu dmar po'i rtse la by'am ser pos byin gyis brlabs pa'o //

analyzed: lha mo la aa las padma 'dab ma gsum pa dy'am las ze'u 'bru dkar po'i rtse mo la dy'am ser pos byin gyis brlabs pa /

analyzed: de yang lha mo'i snying po dang nye snying gnyis lte ba dang snying ga / rang gi snying po dang nye snying mgrin pa dang dpral ba la'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das ma la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'o byed pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'o byed pa /

original: de nas yum gyis yab la 'o byed do //
analyzed: de nas yum gyis yab la 'o byed do //

original: de nas yi ge gsum gyi dga' ba yang brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yi ge gsum gyi dga' ba yang brtsam par bya'o //

original: phem zhes brjod cing thugs ka'i 'od las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo lha mo bcu drug la sogs pas mchod nas bdag dang lha rnams la gzhug par bya'o //

translated: Reciting pheṃ, the wisdom wheel invited by the samādhi arisen from the light of the heart is offered to the sixteen goddesses and so on and is caused to enter oneself and the deity.

analyzed: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham zhes brjod nas /

analyzed: pad kor byas la 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis byed cing /
translated: having made the lotus gesture, one should perform the embrace.

analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

original: de'i rjes la 'khor lo dang dus @224a * //
analyzed: de'i rjes la 'khor lo dang dus @224a * //
translated: After that, the wheel and the time.🔽

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um h'um phat /

original: yum la rnam snang /

analyzed: aom na mastr'a sa ni ma ra ni su pra bhe da ni aa pa r'a dza ye h'um h'um phat /

analyzed: aom na mo dza ye bi dza ye dza mabha ni sta mabha ni mo ha ni hum h'um phat /

analyzed: aom na mo badzra b'a r'a h'i ma h'a yo gi n'i k'a me shva ri kha ge h'um h'um phat /

original: de yang phyag gnyis pa la /
analyzed: de yang phyag gnyis pa la /
translated: Furthermore, there are two types of offerings to the father and mother:

analyzed: de'i shes rab kyang de la thugs ka'i khu ba'i rang bzhin chags pa chen po'i h'um dmar po la /
translated: Also, his wisdom is the nature of the semen at the heart, the red hūṃ of great passion.

original: de la yang a'u ha la /
analyzed: de la yang a'u ha la /
translated: Also, the āḥ is on the ha.

original: mgo zla tshes la /
analyzed: mgo zla tshes la /

translated: In this way, one should view the various maṇḍala wheels of the deity, the nature of nondual compassion and emptiness, in the ultimate and enter into lucid clarity.

analyzed: de nas de'i dang las skad cig gis bzhengs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Then, since it is the nondual suchness that arises from that bindu in an instant,

translated: since it is for the purpose of those of inferior faculties, the individual natures of the deities of the maṇḍalacakra are applied to the individual thirty-seven factors of awakening.

original: de las skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de las skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
translated: If one becomes weary of that, one should recite the mantra.

original: lte ba'i padma la zla ba la gnas pa'i n'a da dkar dmar la 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung dang lhan cig aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bzlas pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o //

translated: The vajra recitation is the mental recitation of om, ah, and hum together with the wind that enters, abides, and rises in the white and red nadas located on the moon in the navel chakra.

original: de bzhin du n'a da kho na la lha'i tshogs spro bsdu sngon du 'gro ba snying po dang nye snying bzlas shing lha so so'i sngags kyang brjod la spro bsdu bya ba ni dam tshig gi bzlas pa la slob pa'o //

translated: Similarly, one trains in the pledge recitation, which is the recitation of the essence and quintessence preceded by the emanation and gathering of the assembly of deities in the nadas alone, and one should also recite the individual mantras of the deities and perform the emanation and gathering.

analyzed: chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyi dang las sngags kyi phreng ba'i dngos po rang gi zhal nas rdo rje'i lam nas padmar /
translated: The recitation of the garland of the mantra is the recitation of the mantra garland from one’s mouth through the vajra path into the lotus of the mother.

original: de nas dh'u t'i nas zhugs yum gyi zhal nas rang gi zhal du ko ro ro 'khor bar bsam /
analyzed: de nas dh'u t'i nas zhugs yum gyi zhal nas rang gi zhal du ko ro ro 'khor bar bsam /

original: sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa do li'i bzlas pa slob pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa do li'i bzlas pa slob pa'o //
translated: The recitation of the garland of the mantra is the training in the recitation of the garland of the mantra.

analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ram sv'a h'a /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o //
translated: This is the essence of the Bhagavān.

original: a'om hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat /
analyzed: a'om hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: nye a'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye a'i snying po'o //
translated: This is the essence of the upasādhana.

original: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i yee hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
